metadata.synopsis: One liner AD that a Lorroakan Projection says when a player has entered a wrong portal at Sorcerous Sundries and therefore got deleported and killed. He will basically mock and/or chastise the player for attempting to reach him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with a portal that is not the blue one in CTY_Main_A 8; 30; -92

0.speaker: Lorroakan's Projection
0.text: For your own personal safety, it is ill-advised to waste Master Lorroakan's time.
